name: WebLicht All In One (NL)
creators: CLARIN-D Centre at the University of Tuebingen, Germany
authentication: Requires a CLARIN Service Provider Federation account, provided by many universities and institutions.
description: WebLicht Easy Chain for Dutch text annotations: part of speech, lemmas, morphology and dependency parsing. The pipeline makes use of WebLicht's TCF converter, the Blingfire tokenizer, and the SfS Sticker. WebLicht's Tundra can be used to visualize the result.
